articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Why Williams F1 team keeping Sargeant makes more sense than you think - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Williams' call to hand Logan Sargeant a sophomore year in Formula 1 divides opinion, but there are several reasons why James Vowles' vote of confidence in the American makes sense.
articles.content: 22-0 in qualifying. 27-1 in points. Sargeant has been completely dominated by team-mate Alex Albon in his first season in F1, after being promoted earlier than expected when other options to replace … [+5270 chars]
